review: The HDMI metal part came partially loose, connected it to the TV and after 3 hours of broadcasting / charging it just stopped working.Not happy at all about the product, quality and state of delivery, I don't believe a product should come in that condition. Returning it is now a problem since I had to go back to my home country.
author: Santiago

review: I really really like this thing.  I briefly considered the Roku 3 (per internet reviews) but my sister had gotten one of these for Christmas last year and said it was great.  The Roku does have more to offer in some ways, but it doesn't have the mirror option - whatever is device you're transmitting from mirrors to the TV the cast is connected and setup to.  That and the Roku was 3x more $$. I really just wanted something to utilize Daily Burn with, watch some movies or Netflix, and listen to music on the louder TV speaker with.Great little gadget - I'd totally recommend.
author: Erin W.
